title: The alabaster chain: Complete trilogy
description: "The alabaster chain" is a science fiction trilogy, consisting of the novelettes "Satori 5", "Crystal Ashes" and "Brother". This edition contains the complete saga.Set in a dystopian future, the story that plays with the leading character's mind as well as the reader's. Nothing is what it seems, despite its apparent transparency.Behind a happy fa√ßade lies a future where social networks have disappeared, internet is property of just a select few and privacy has become the greatest of privileges.Follow the story of two brothers separated by time, space and an unforgettable woman. See how far leaders can go for their ideals.
author: Sarah K. Antonelli
